response: Welcome to the 120th anniversary of Harley Davidson, where we celebrate with six limited edition motorcycles and one exclusive custom vehicle. Inspired by the art deco features of the 1933 V.L.D. Speed bird, our designers have created unique anniversary designs. The motorcycles feature an heirloom red base color, modernized with advanced painting technology, and a dark midnight crimson fade. Each model is marked with a unique serial number, adding exclusivity. Highlighting the anniversary collection is the super premium CVO Road Glide Limited Anniversary model, with only 1500 units globally. Join us in celebrating 120 years of excellence and innovation in motorcycle design.
title: 120 Anniversary- Limited Edition 1301 v6.mp4
